channel.title: march on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in march on Barefoot Rob

item.title: State of My Life Address
item.description: 21:46 Sunday 03 March 2019 JST I will be traveling to the US for 22 days starting March 13th. Not packed yet, but have it planned for next week. I have just sent a list of workshops to Tokyo Men’s Circle Men, my stretch was to find workshops that we can do in Tokyo. I have led #1 and #3 below. As a group, we did #2 in August 2018 for ourselves, and then again in November 2018 for new men.

item.title: It snowed today
item.description: 00:34 Thursday 22 March 2018 JST It snowed “today” and was 2 degrees C all day long. It’s apparently going up to 16 or 18 degrees C tomorrow. I chatted with Delayna who I’ve known since our mutual YRUU days back in late 1980s, culminating with ConCon 1988. Looking forward to seeing her herb business grow!
